overview: Married couple, Ethan and Zeena, are in need an extra hand around the house due to Zeena's debilitated body and constant illness. The young woman who joins them is a beautiful, spirited person. She and Ethan fall in love much to the dismay of Zeena.
tagline: A classic tale of forbidden passion
cast: Liam Neeson|Patricia Arquette|Joan Allen|Tate Donovan|Stephen Mendillo
